title: Skin Shard / Permanents explanation please
body:
So i'm looking at my hextech loot tab, and i'm looking through the "Skins Loot" section, i have 2 Epic Skin loots atm.

 they have different notes / borders...

I have "Epic Skin Permanent" Elderwood Hecarim and "Epic Skin Shard" Master Arcanist Ziggs with a normal blue border, none have icons in the bottom right.

My question is, What's the difference in activating Skin Permanent's and Skin Shard's in Hextech loot system? When i use the Hecarim skin, when i use that particular skin, when i loadin i get a gold border also to my champ art and ziggs doesn't? 

Otherwise Hecarim is 675 orange essence and Ziggs is 450, both are 1350rp store price. 

But i really don't see the application in permanent or shard's if you don't own, don't they both just give you the skin? So whats the wording for?

replies.body:
What Nijiiyo said sounds about right, but if you want a more detailed explanation you'll probs have to give us screenshots as we can really only guess at what you are referring to :)

I only have a champ shard atm but it's the same principle just with diff colour essence so I'll explain as best I can.
___
http://i.imgur.com/KA40hKj.png

**Reroll into permanent** - Rerolls the shard with two others to give a random permanent champion that will be automatically redeemed

**Disenchant into Essence (+325)**  - will destroy the shard and give essence for it, as Nijiiyo said, it sounds liek this is the number you are referring to, and permanent loot would give you more essence for disenchanting than a shard would.

**Activate Rental for 7 days** - will consume the shard and make it's content available for 7 days (Likely your Ziggs shard will have this, but your Hecarim loot won't)

**Upgrade to permanent (-670)** - will consume 670 essence to make the shard permanent loot and automatically redeem it (Your Ziggs shard will have this, your Hec loot will likely have something else that just says redeem, since it is already permanent loot)
___
No idea what gold border you are talking about, a screenshot would be immensely helpful here.

The gold bordered Hecarim skin represents a Skin Permanent, which is acquired by re-rolling 3 skin shards. Skin Shards have blue borders, which are acquired by opening Hextech Crafting Chests.

Is that borderline available during loadin screen? As i've seen it on others also, some say its for ranked, it may be the "Gold" border, but i thought it was different style.

No, these borders won't carry into loading screen; the different colors and icons are just there to distinguish between the different types of Hextech Loot, whether they're Epic, Legendary, Permanent, or Shards.

Fair call, appreciated.

Probably worth a company footnote, may want to put some better explanations in the hextech loot help button :P

Okie yeah, the orange essence displayed is what they are worth if you disenchant them, and the gold border is because it's a permanent as Wuks said. 

If you click on Hec it should be free to redeem it, and Ziggs will cost Orange essence to redeem.

> tried to take a screen shot with PrtSc didn't work, tried googling if League has any short cuts, F12 apparently and in the riot folder, both not working, suggestions for screen shotting profile stuff?

Snipping Tool (if you're on windows just search int he start menu for it) is by far the easiest way to capture client stuff. If you play in borderless windowed you can do this for in game as well if you only watch to catch part of the screen.

If you play full screen or just want a whole screenshot in game then that's where the F12 (default option) and Riot folder come in.

you get 33% of that champs rp cost in essence for shards and 50% for full skins

and epic skins have a red triangle in the middle of bottom not corner

i was refering to icons like the legacy one, 

my triangle is blue not red

I think the number you are referring to is the amount of essence you will receive if you choose to disenchant. For example, I have a Glacial Malphite which is an Epic Skin Shard that disenchants for 450 orange essence. I assume permanents disenchant for more since they are far rarer.

I believe the difference between permanent and a skin shard is that a permanent can be redeemed (added to your collection) for 0 essence and a skin shard must be upgraded using the listed amount of essence. Again with the Malphite example, Glacial requires  1050 orange essence. Elderwood should be free (though I don't know what it looks like since I've never got a permanent outright).
I was under the impression permanents cost no dust to make into a real skin.
